hero.title: Automate operations.
hero.subtitle: Focus on strategy.
hero.description: Buildera diagnoses your digital presence, generates your strategy with AI, and activates an autonomous system that operates Marketing, Sales, Finance, Legal, HR, and Operations — with human oversight and guardrails on every decision.

trust.message: Designed for founders and CEOs of growth-stage SMEs

autonomousEnterprise.title: Progressive autonomy, not full replacement
autonomousEnterprise.subtitle: The system starts with simple tasks and, as it learns about your business, assumes greater responsibility — always under your supervision and with active safety controls.

adaptive.title: Verifiable learning
adaptive.description: Every autonomous decision is logged with its outcome. The system memorizes what works for your specific context and adjusts behavior with real data, not assumptions.

genesis.title: On-demand capabilities
genesis.description: When the system detects an operational gap (e.g., no competitive monitoring), it proposes a new capability with a 7-day trial period before permanent activation.

crossDept.title: Cross-departmental governance
crossDept.description: Finance can halt campaigns exceeding budget. Legal validates before Sales closes. Every action goes through configurable guardrails before execution.

items.approval: Human approval required for high-impact actions
items.audit: Complete log of every autonomous decision and its outcome
items.limits: Configurable daily credit and execution limits
items.override: Manual override available at any time

agentShowcase.title: Each agent has a specific function
agentShowcase.subtitle: AI agents trained to execute concrete tasks in each department. Not chatbots — operational tools that generate measurable deliverables.

strategist.name: Marketing Strategist
strategist.description: Generates mission, vision, and value proposition based on your company's digital diagnosis.

content.name: Content Creator
content.description: Produces posts and articles adapted per platform, aligned with your brand strategy.

calendar.name: Calendar Planner
calendar.description: Organizes your content with dates and times optimized by engagement data.

insights.name: Insights Generator
insights.description: Analyzes real metrics and detects actionable patterns to improve results.

brand.name: Brand Designer
brand.description: Creates visual identity with consistent color palette, typography, and style guides.

image.name: Image Creator
image.description: Generates graphics and visual assets aligned with your brand identity.

audience.name: Audience Analyst
audience.description: Segments your target audience with verifiable demographic and behavioral data.

optimizer.name: Campaign Optimizer
optimizer.description: Evaluates performance by channel and recommends adjustments based on real data.

howItWorks.title: 3 phases to activate your intelligent enterprise
howItWorks.subtitle: A structured process from diagnosis to operational autonomy — no magic jumps or empty promises.

1.title: Digital Diagnosis
1.description: When you register your company, the system automatically analyzes your website, social media, SEO, competition, and digital positioning to create an operational X-ray.

2.title: Strategic DNA
2.description: Using diagnosis data, specialized agents generate your business strategy: mission, vision, brand, audiences, and content plan — all aligned with your current reality.

3.title: Enterprise Autopilot
3.description: The Enterprise Brain activates its autonomous cycle: observes indicators, analyzes options, validates with guardrails, executes actions, and learns from results — with configurable human oversight.

whatWeDoNot.title: What Buildera does NOT do
whatWeDoNot.subtitle: We believe trust is built with clarity. Here's what you won't find on our platform.

replace.title: Does not replace your business judgment
replace.description: The system suggests and executes operational tasks. High-impact strategic decisions always require your approval.

magic.title: Does not generate magic results
magic.description: Autonomy is progressive. The system needs your business data to learn and improve. The first cycles are calibration.

data.title: Does not invent data or metrics
data.description: Every insight is based on real data from your company. If there's not enough data, the system tells you and suggests how to get it.

unsupervised.title: Does not operate unsupervised
unsupervised.description: Every autonomous action has an auditable log. You can configure which actions require manual approval and set daily limits.

agentsInAction.title: How the Enterprise Brain operates
agentsInAction.subtitle: Concrete examples of how the system processes a need, analyzes it, and generates an action — with full traceability.

strategist.input: The system detects that Instagram engagement dropped 40% in the last 2 weeks.

output.title: Analysis and proposed action
output.content: Diagnosis: algorithm change affected static image posts. Action: migrate 60% of calendar to Reels with brand templates. Guardrail: don't exceed weekly content budget. Status: pending approval.

content.input: A competitor launched a similar product with aggressive pricing.

output.title: New capability proposed
output.content: Gap detected: no competitive pricing monitoring. Proposal: 'Competitive Pricing Monitor' — weekly tracking of competitor prices with alerts. Trial period: 7 days before permanent activation.

insights.input: What patterns has the system identified in the last 4 weeks?

output.title: 3 patterns identified with data
output.content: 1. Posts with real people: +3.2x engagement (based on 45 posts analyzed). 2. Best schedule: Tue/Thu 7-8PM (based on 120 publications). 3. Leads responding in <1h close 58% more (based on 32 opportunities).

scalable.title: Progressive autonomy
scalable.description: Starts simple, grows with your business

problem.title: The real problem for growth-stage SMEs
problem.subtitle: You need to scale operations without multiplying headcount costs. Buildera gives you an AI operations team with built-in governance.

dispersed.title: More time operating than leading
dispersed.description: the CEO ends up managing social media, invoices, and vendors instead of defining strategy.

expertise.title: Specialized expertise is expensive
expertise.description: a team of marketing + finance + legal + HR can cost $15K+/month for an SME.

visibility.title: Decisions without data
visibility.description: acting on intuition because there's no time or tools to analyze metrics.

specialists.title: AI operations team
specialists.description: specialized agents executing tasks across 6 departments, coordinated by a central brain.

security.title: Governance and traceability
security.description: every autonomous action has an auditable log with the reasoning, outcome, and guardrail applied.

measurable.title: Measurable results
measurable.description: impact metrics per department: engagement, leads, hours saved, autonomous decision success rate.

ecosystem.title: System architecture
ecosystem.subtitle: Three layers working together: your company defines objectives, the AI brain executes, and external signals feed the intelligence.

companies.title: Your Company
companies.description: Defines objectives, approves critical actions, and configures system guardrails.

developers.title: Enterprise Brain
developers.description: Specialized agents coordinated by an autonomous cycle with 6 governance phases.

experts.title: External Signals
experts.description: Market, competition, and regulatory data feeding system decisions.

ecosystem.impact: Result: scalable operations with human oversight, continuous learning, and built-in governance.

useCases.title: Use cases by department
useCases.subtitle: Concrete examples of what each autonomous department can execute with human oversight.

socialMedia.title: Marketing
socialMedia.description: Content generation, calendar planning, and optimization based on engagement metrics.

customerService.title: Sales
customerService.description: Lead qualification, proposal generation, and forecast based on pipeline data.

sales.title: Finance
sales.description: Budget monitoring, spend alerts, and guardrails preventing over-execution.

ecommerce.title: Legal
ecommerce.description: Regulatory monitoring and compliance alerts adapted to your sector.

professionalServices.title: HR
professionalServices.description: Talent profiles, organizational climate analysis, and training recommendations.

education.title: Operations
education.description: Bottleneck detection, repetitive task automation, and SLA monitoring.

finalCta.title: Start with a free diagnosis of your company
finalCta.description: In less than 60 seconds, the system analyzes your digital presence and generates a personalized action plan. No commitment, no credit card.

architecture.title: Enterprise Autopilot Brain Architecture
architecture.subtitle: Modular AI infrastructure designed to operate business departments with governance, traceability, and continuous learning.

layers.title: System layers
layers.subtitle: 5 independent layers communicating via events and sharing a unified business context bus.

decisionEngine.title: Decision Engine
decisionEngine.description: Central engine that receives signals from the business environment, evaluates options through multi-criteria reasoning, and generates prioritized decisions per department. Operates on enriched context with brand, strategy, audience, and historical metrics data.

agentOrchestration.title: Agent Orchestration Layer
agentOrchestration.description: Maps each decision to the corresponding specialized agent, injects required context (brand, audience, strategy) based on the agent's context_requirements field, and manages parallel or sequential execution.

guardrailCompliance.title: Guardrail & Compliance Layer
guardrailCompliance.description: Intercepts every decision before execution. Applies budget rules (Finance can block Marketing), regulatory compliance (Legal validates before Sales), and user-configured operational limits.

learningMemory.title: Learning & Memory Layer
learningMemory.description: Evaluates the outcome of each executed decision using real metrics (engagement, ROI, conversion rate). Stores lessons learned with context hash for retrieval in similar future situations.

capabilityGenesis.title: Capability Genesis Engine
capabilityGenesis.description: Analyzes blocked or failed decisions to detect operational gaps. Proposes new autonomous capabilities with a governed lifecycle: Proposal → Trial (7 days) → Activation/Deprecation.

agentMap.title: Agent-to-department map
agentMap.subtitle: Each department has assigned specialized agents. The Enterprise Brain orchestrates them based on needs detected in each cycle.
agentMap.brainSub: SENSE → THINK → GUARD → ACT → LEARN → EVOLVE

cycle.title: The autonomous cycle in operational detail
cycle.subtitle: Each phase has a specific technical function. The full cycle executes periodically based on configured frequency (1h, 6h, 24h).

sense.title: SENSE — Observe
sense.description: Collects environmental data: social media metrics, sales pipeline status, budget alerts, external market and competitive signals.

details.1: Sources: Social APIs, CRM, internal metrics, competitive scraping
details.2: Output: Business state snapshot with per-department indicators

think.title: THINK — Analyze
think.description: The Decision Engine evaluates the snapshot against defined objectives, active strategy, and learned lessons. Generates candidate decisions with priority and assigned agent.

details.1: Input: Snapshot + strategy + previous decision memory
details.2: Output: Prioritized decision list with agent_to_execute and parameters

guard.title: GUARD — Validate
guard.description: Every decision goes through the guardrail layer. Finance can block actions exceeding budget. Legal can halt operations without compliance. Users configure thresholds.

details.1: Validations: budget, compliance, daily limits, company policies

act.title: ACT — Execute
act.description: Approved decisions are executed by invoking the assigned agent's Edge Function. Full business context is injected based on the agent's context_requirements.

details.2: Logging: agent_usage_log with credits consumed, execution time, result

learn.title: LEARN — Learn
learn.description: After execution, the system evaluates real impact using post-action metrics (engagement delta, leads generated, ROI). Results are stored in autopilot_memory.

details.1: Metrics evaluated: engagement, conversion, ROI, satisfaction, efficiency
details.2: Storage: lesson_learned + outcome_score + context_hash for retrieval

evolve.title: EVOLVE — Evolve
evolve.description: The Capability Genesis Engine analyzes blocked decisions or gaps. If recurring operational gaps are detected, it proposes new autonomous capabilities with a trial period.

details.1: Analysis: decisions with action_taken=false or outcome_score < threshold
details.2: Lifecycle: Proposal → 7-day Trial → Evaluation → Activation or Deprecation

dataFlow.title: Complete data flow
dataFlow.description: Each cycle generates an auditable record in autopilot_execution_log with: context_snapshot, decisions_made, actions_taken, credits_consumed, and execution_time_ms. Logs are accessible from the dashboard for manual review at any time.

genesis.title: Adaptive infrastructure expansion
genesis.subtitle: The system doesn't just execute — it detects operational gaps and proposes new autonomous capabilities with full governance. No manual intervention. No additional code.

gapDetection.title: Operational gap detection
gapDetection.description: The Gap Detector analyzes blocked, failed, or below-threshold decisions. When it detects a recurring failure pattern in a specific area, it classifies it as an operational gap.

details.1: Analyzes autopilot_decisions with action_taken=false or guardrail_result=blocked
details.2: Correlates failures by department, decision type, and temporal frequency
details.3: Generates gap_evidence with verifiable data: incident count, period, and affected department

agentProposal.title: New agent proposal
agentProposal.description: The Capability Proposer generates a complete agent specification: name, department, trigger_condition, required data, and success metrics — all based on the detected gap evidence.

details.1: Defines capability_code, capability_name, and target department
details.2: Specifies trigger_condition: conditions that activate the agent automatically
details.3: Establishes required_data and minimum required_maturity for activation

governance.title: New capability governance
governance.description: Each proposed capability goes through a configurable approval cycle. Low-risk ones auto-activate with a trial period. High-impact ones require explicit human approval.

details.2: Human approval required for action-executing capabilities (sends, spending)
details.3: Auditable log in autopilot_capabilities with status, activation_reason, and gap_evidence

integration.title: Integration into existing workflows
integration.description: Activated capabilities integrate into the SENSE-THINK-GUARD-ACT-LEARN cycle without manual intervention. The Agent Router detects them automatically and includes them in departmental orchestration.

details.2: The Decision Engine includes the new capability in its decision evaluation
details.3: Agent metrics feed the Learning & Memory layer from the first cycle

lifecycle.title: Autonomous capability lifecycle
lifecycle.subtitle: From gap detection to production integration — every stage is auditable and reversible.

govern.title: Approval
govern.description: Auto-approved or human review based on risk

integrate.title: Activation
integrate.description: Integrated into autonomous cycle or deprecated

useCase.title: Real example: Regulatory alert agent
useCase.subtitle: How the system detected a compliance gap and generated a new autonomous agent without human intervention.
useCase.trigger: The Legal module blocked 3 Sales decisions in 2 weeks due to missing regulatory validation. The sales team had no visibility into sector-specific regulatory changes.

step1.title: Gap Detector identifies the pattern
step1.description: 3 blocked decisions in Legal with guardrail_result='compliance_missing'. Affected department: Sales. Frequency: 1.5x/week. Classification: recurring operational gap.

step2.title: Capability Proposer generates specification
step2.description: Proposal: 'Sector Regulatory Monitor' — agent that monitors regulatory changes relevant to the company's sector and generates preventive alerts before they affect commercial operations.

step3.title: Governance evaluates risk
step3.description: Classification: low risk (monitoring and alerts only, no action execution). Result: auto_activate=true with 7-day trial period. No human approval required.

step4.title: Trial period: 7 days
step4.description: The agent monitors regulatory sources, generates 4 relevant alerts and 0 false positives. Utility rate evaluated by Legal team: 92%.

step5.title: Permanent activation
step5.description: Result: status='active'. The agent integrates into the Legal department's autonomous cycle. Sales decisions are now pre-validated with updated regulatory data.

useCase.outcome: Sales decisions blocked by compliance: from 3/week to 0. Response time to regulatory changes: from days to hours. Additional cost: 0 — the agent was generated and activated by the system.

governanceNote.title: All expansion is governed
governanceNote.description: No capability is permanently activated without evaluation. Capabilities with outcome_score below threshold are automatically deprecated. Every activation and deprecation is recorded in the auditable log with the complete evidence that justifies it.

businessImpact.title: Results that transform your company's valuation
businessImpact.subtitle: Buildera isn't just another tool — it's infrastructure that reduces founder dependency, institutionalizes knowledge, and increases your company's value.

founderDependency.before: The founder is the bottleneck — every decision flows through one person
founderDependency.after: Operational decisions automated with guardrails — founder focuses on strategy

decisionBottleneck.before: Days or weeks to analyze data and make critical decisions
decisionBottleneck.after: Real-time analysis and autonomous decisions in minutes

knowledgeLoss.before: Critical knowledge lives in the heads of key employees
knowledgeLoss.after: All operational knowledge captured, learned, and available 24/7

manualProcesses.before: Repetitive manual processes consuming hours every week

reactiveStrategy.before: Reactive strategy based on intuition and limited data
reactiveStrategy.after: Proactive AI-driven strategy with continuous learning cycle

valuation.title: Buildera as valuation infrastructure
valuation.description: Companies with systematized operations and low founder dependency receive significantly higher valuation multiples. Buildera transforms your business from a people-dependent operation to a replicable autonomous system — increasing its value to investors and acquirers.

businessImpact.disclaimer: * Projected results based on industry benchmarks. Individual results may vary.

dashboardPreview.title: Total control over enterprise autonomy
dashboardPreview.subtitle: An enterprise-grade panel giving you full visibility over every autonomous decision, pending approval, and governance alert — in real time.
